title: Understanding the Concept
text: In statistics, a statistic is a numerical value that represents a characteristic of a sample. It is used to estimate the corresponding parameter of the population.

title: Sample vs. Population
text: The average height calculated from the $$50$$ sunflowers is based on a sample, not the entire population of sunflowers in the field.

title: Defining a Statistic
text: A statistic is a measure that describes a characteristic of a sample, such as the average height of the $$50$$ sunflowers.

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: Given that the average height is calculated from a sample of $$50$$ sunflowers, what is this an example of?
